name: top_level_genre
description: One of: sutra, jataka, commentary, vinaya, or history.

name: taisho_genre
description: One of: Āgama, Jātaka and Avadāna, Prajñāpāramitā, ...

name: is_mahayana
description: Used as to evaluate the model

name: is_dialog
description: Is the text in the form of a dialog?

name: speaker
description: The identity of the speaker or empty if there is no speaker.

name: contains_dharani
description: Does the text contain a dhāraṇī?

name: philosophical_argumentation
description: Does the text contain philosophical argumentation?

name: karmic_retribution
description: Does the text contain a story of karmic retribution?

name: historical_people
description: JSON array of historical people mentioned in the text.

name: deities
description: JSON array of deities mentioned in the text.

name: places
description: JSON array of places mentioned in the text.

name: text_references
description: JSON array of historical people mentioned in the text.
